name: andover-ct-dems
description: Notes for the Andover (CT) Democratic Town Committee

scripts.release: cross-var tiddlywiki . --output docs --build index && cross-var shx mkdir -p docs/$npm_package_version && cross-var shx cp docs/index.html docs/$npm_package_version/index.html
scripts.release-voters: cross-var tiddlywiki voters --output docs/voters --build index && cross-var shx mkdir -p docs/voters/$npm_package_config_voters-version && cross-var shx cp docs/voters/index.html docs/voters/$npm_package_config_voters-version/index.html
scripts.release-voters2025: cross-var tiddlywiki voters2025 --output docs/voters2025 --build index && cross-var shx mkdir -p docs/voters2025/$npm_package_config_voters2025-version && cross-var shx cp docs/voters2025/index.html docs/voters2025/$npm_package_config_voters2025-version/index.html
scripts.release-candidates: cross-var tiddlywiki candidates --output docs/candidates --build index && cross-var shx mkdir -p docs/candidates/$npm_package_config_candidates-version && cross-var shx cp docs/candidates/index.html docs/candidates/$npm_package_config_candidates-version/index.html
scripts.release-anon: cross-var tiddlywiki anon --output docs/anon --build index && cross-var shx mkdir -p docs/voters/$npm_package_config_anon-version && cross-var shx cp docs/anon/index.html docs/anon/$npm_package_config_anon-version/index.html

author: Scott Sauyet
